q: veteran GOP strategist. "The key is the conservative movement adopting him as its favorite." Charlie Black said those urging Mike Pence to run are important conservative leaders. But Mike Pence will need more. The folks I've heard, the names I've seen, are the leaders of the social conservative movement, said GOP strategist Scott Reed, who managed Bob Dole 's presidential campaign in 1996. "And that is a strong base from which to start. But it isn't going to get you to the finish line.
